column1: #text=Today I decided to visit one of my friends that I have n't seen in a very long time .
#text=They just moved into a new apartment and they invited me over .
#text=They gave me their address but I was n't sure how to get there by train .
#text=The first thing I did when I got to the train station was see what train goes to their neighborhood .
#text=After I figured that out , I made sure I had enough money on my metro card to pay the train fare .
#text=After going through the turnstile I waited on the train platform for the train to enter the station .
#text=I quickly found a seat on the train since not to many people were on it .
#text=After about 25 minutes I finally arrived at the stop I was supposed to get off at .
#text=I walked up the stairs and exited the train station and walked 2 blocks away to where my friend lives .
